title: Facebook Won’t Monitor Political Speech: So What’s The Truth Here?
text: With Mark Zuckerberg’s recent announcement that Facebook will permit posting of even obviously false political ads, can it manage the hire wire act of being a publisher that doesn't act as an editor when it doesn't want to?

title: Government officials around the globe targeted by hackers through Facebook’s WhatsApp
text: Senior government officials in multiple US-allied countries were targeted earlier this year with hacking software that used Facebook’s WhatsApp to take over users’ phones, according to people familiar with the messaging company’s investigation. Sources familiar with WhatsApp’s internal investigation into the breach said a “significant” portion of the known victims are high-profile government and military officials.

title: NSA and Facebook have similar data models, says NSA whistleblower Edward Snowden
